body:
Syntax: cast 'sanctuary' <target>

Sanctuary surrounds the target with a divine protective aura that reduces
all physical damage by half. This powerful spell provides the ultimate
defensive enhancement for surviving dangerous encounters.

Classes: Cleric
Level: 15
Mana Cost: 110
Duration: 4 hours  
Position: Standing or Fighting

When sanctuary is active, the target glows with a bright white aura and
takes only half damage from all physical attacks. This spell is invaluable
for tanks and anyone facing overwhelming odds.

See Also: ARMOR, BLESS
